name: Software Engineering Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of software engineering concepts.

questions_list.question: What is the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC)?

options.A: A process used by software industries to design, develop and test high-quality software products.
options.B: A methodology used in agile development.
options.C: A technique used to detect software bugs.

questions_list.question: What is the purpose of a UML diagram?

options.A: To represent the design of a software system visually.

questions_list.question: What is the difference between black-box testing and white-box testing?

answers_list.3: Black-box testing focuses on testing the functionality of the software without knowing its internal code, while white-box testing tests the internal logic and code structure of the software.
